infobox.Japanese title:: 最期のアーン  (Saigo no Ān)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Kazunobu Chiba  Tsujimura
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Mitsuo Iwata as Saburo Nakanishi  Sumie Sakai as Hideko Nitta  Toshiharu Sakurai as Nobuo Yamamoto  Takuma Suzuki as Tsujimura  Kenji Hamada as Detective Numada  Hiromichi Kogami as Detective Inoue  Miki Itō as Yumi Suzuki
infobox.Closing song:: Mō Kimi Dake o Hanashitari wa Shinai

sections.Situation:
Kogoro and Conan are brought to an apartment to examine the death of a man, Nobuo Yamamoto.

The case is presumed to be a suicide as evidence project he puts a gun in his mouth and fires. His friend, Saburo Nakanishi, is suspected of murdering him as he left the crime scene without calling the police. When Kogoro is fed strawberries, Conan realizes who the murderer is.

- Tokyo MPD First Division police detective

- Yumi's husband
sections.International edition: The international edition distributed by TMS has a censored scene.
sections.Trivia:
- Detective Inoue's car is a 2003 dark blue Nissan Bluebird Sylphy [G10]. The license plate number is 新宿 500, に 87-29 (Shinjuku 500, Ni 87-29).
- Nobuo's SUV is a dark green Toyota Land Cruiser [J80].
- The weapon used to kill Nobuo is a Colt M1911A1.
